item.title: The rise and fall of schools
item.author: Achuthsankar S. Nair
item.description: Save Our Schools: In 1935, The Maharaja’s High School for Girls split into three schools – one each at Cotton Hill, Barton Hill and Manacaud. The school at Barton Hill now remains in the memory of its students

item.title: Chronicles of a luminary
item.author: Athira M.
item.description: Campus reconnect: Freedom fighter and lawyer K. Aiyappan Pillai remembers his vibrant campus days
